SIS Monthly Satsang (November 2012)

Events

3.00 p.m : Vishnu Sahasranamam
3.20 p.m : Lalitha Sahasranamam
3:40 p.m : Bhajans
4:00 p.m : Spiritual Talk
4:15 p.m : Aarathi and Prasadam

Please RSVP by sending an e-mail to sisnambalava@gmail.com or calling Mrs. Uma Kalyansundar on 07984 339418 / 07841 715005 / 020 8215 4018 by 2nd November
